properties.comment: Set finish variable when the game was finished

properties.text: It seems you answered none of the questions correctly. Bummer, but you can always try again.
You answered ${players[0]["score"]} out of ${questionNum} questions correctly ${SHORT_PAUSE} Not bad. ${SHORT_PAUSE} Bad would be none.
You answered ${players[0]["score"]} out of ${questionNum} questions correctly.
The winner is ${status.name}, with ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer} questions correct. Well done!
In the last place is ${status.name} , with ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer}.  ${SHORT_PAUSE}
In the second, and last place is ${status.name}, with ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer}.  ${SHORT_PAUSE}
In the ${ordinal(status.rank)} place is ${status.name}, with ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer} questions correct. ${SHORT_PAUSE}

properties.comment: Multiplayer - when some are scores the same

properties.text: The last place is shared between ${human_concat(status.names, 'and')}, with ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer} questions. ${SHORT_PAUSE}
The ${ordinal(status.rank)} place is shared between ${human_concat(status.names, 'and')}, with ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer} questions correct. ${SHORT_PAUSE}

properties.comment: Multiplayer - when all scores are the same

properties.text: Wow! None of you got any of the answers right.  ${SHORT_PAUSE} Well, you can always try again.
It's a tie! ${SHORT_PAUSE}${human_concat(status.names, 'and')} you both answered, ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer} questions correctly.
Unbelievable! ${SHORT_PAUSE} ${human_concat(status.names, 'and')} you all answered ${status.score} out of ${numberOfQuestionsPerPlayer} questions correctly.
